content:
Yes, some of these restaurants have outdoor seating:

- La Concepción Mirador Boutique Hotel & Restaurant - This restaurant has an outdoor terrace where you can enjoy your meal with a beautiful view of the city. - Il Paparazzo - This restaurant is located in a charming garden with outdoor seating where you can enjoy a panoramic view of the city while dining. - Cafe Turri - The outdoor seating area of this cafe provides an excellent view of the colorful houses and the harbor. - Casa Higueras - This restaurant has a beautiful outdoor terrace where you can enjoy the view of Valparaíso while indulging in some delicious seafood. However, it's best to check with the restaurants directly or make a note on your reservation to request a table with outdoor seating. Keep in mind that outdoor seating may be subject to weather conditions.
